name: disk-clean-mcp
description: Read-only disk usage analysis MCP server. Suggests cleanup by size, type, recency, and duplicates.
author: Superandyfre

tools.name: scan_summary
tools.description: Summarize total size, file count, and directory count with optional depth and ignore globs.

tools.name: by_type
tools.description: Top file extensions ranked by total size.

tools.name: top_files
tools.description: Largest files with filters (min size, age, glob include/exclude).

tools.name: stale_candidates
tools.description: Large and old files suggested for cleanup.

tools.name: duplicate_candidates
tools.description: Groups of files with identical size and content hash (read-only).
